TopicTitle: (RSS/RO) Constellation Essentials v1.3.1: Trusses, Engines, Adapters (Apr21)

Articles.Content: but are you going to make it fit on the ares v from the american pack?

Downloaded the copernicus-stuff more or less to "test" it... Already loving it:

Will undock a full tank on the station, grab an empty one and go fill it up... And the maneuvering thrusters are aligned with CoM, which wouldn't be possible without the copernicus strut :3

Thanks... Aaaand I'm already eager to see what I can do with the lander, once it's done. One way or the other, the trusses will be a core-element of my first interplanetary missions.

how are you doing on the lander is it allmost finished???

and are you going to make one with the space for a return vehicle?

and can you put the lander on the forum because i really want him even without the fairrings( you can maybe use producal fairing mod ??)

Edited June 13, 2014 by jebandhisfriends
I really love the look of this mod and whats been done with the parts, keep it up!

It's not done yet, but yes it will have fairings.

Awesome work Bahamuto .

On a sidenote, Do you know where I can get a J2-X engine from for the Ares 1?
by the american pack you have got one

Is there a license for this pack?

Edited June 30, 2014 by YANFRET
Oops, CC-BY-SA.

Oops, CC-BY-SA.

Thank You!

The RS-68 included with this is very good. Id like include it in a future release. I noticed that the part specifies Aeojet Kerbodyne as the original author, is that correct?

Regards
Its just a kerbalized "Aerojet Rocketdyne". Any similarity with another modder is coincidental. I'm the author of all the parts in this pack.

Its just a kerbalized "Aerojet Rocketdyne". Any similarity with another modder is coincidental. I'm the author of all the parts in this pack.

Ahh. Sorry for the confusion.

Thank you again!
Could we please get an updated release to v1.3 for standard as well?
I assume this is not working in 0.24, is that right?

I assume this is not working in 0.24, is that right?

It's primarily just a parts pack, it should work just fine, barring any dependencies on plugins that need updating. It's not distributed with any plugins of its own... just a truss, some docking adapter rings, some mounting structures for engines....

BahamutoD, love everything you have been working on of late. Just popping in here to let you know there are a few of us who love the Copernicus components. Don't suppose we could get a GitHub release of the lander?

Thanks!

Edited August 2, 2014 by StEligius

there are a few of us who love the Copernicus components.

I second this. Constellation is not dead! ^^
Sorry for the slow-down. I've been working on my other mods and updating stuff to 0.24. I guess I could upload the current Mars lander frame later even though I'm not too happy with it yet.

Sorry for the slow-down.

Not at all, considering the number of mods you maintain. I'll respectfully wait ^^

Support for Engine Ignitor would be great:

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/51880-0-24-2-Engine-Ignitor-%28Resource-ratio-affects-ullage-V3-3-July-30%29

No problem Bahamuto, I was trying to be as least demanding sounding as possible since you are on a roll as far as making lovely mods. I have been in love with Copernicus MTV and the other Constellation components since I first saw the NASA mock-up video (that and your Mk1-2 Propulsion System <3).
please upload the lander frame ?? can you make it suit the american pack arev ?? that would be great
I love the constellation parts, hope you continue this awesome pack! Also, I would be pretty excited to play with the lander frame.

I love the constellation parts, hope you continue this awesome pack! Also, I would be pretty excited to play with the lander frame.

I second this as well, most of my larger ships are now based around these parts cant wait to see the lander

Bummer Starwaster's Copernicus MTV components thread is locked for redevelopment and his component links have been pulled. Constellation/Copernicus sure has had a rough life. Well hope something super spiffy comes of it, still hoping for a "Race to Mars" Terra Nova quintuple drop tank setup.
poke. Hope this mod isn't going to go under, i really love the constellation program and what you've done so far.
